short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Credit Card Details, Addresses & Emails Just Like a Password.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ensure your privacy online with HideMyInfo, the ultimate Chrome extension for safeguarding sensitive details like credit card numbers, addresses, and emails. Whether you're browsing the web or sharing your screen, HideMyInfo automatically hides these crucial data fields, replacing them with password-like protection. With a simple toggle, you can turn this protection on or off, giving you full control over your personal information.

Key Features:

Automatically hide credit card details, addresses, and emails (during screen recordings).
Simple on/off toggle for easy control.
Protects sensitive fields on all websites you visit.
Lightweight, fast, and easy to use.
